definitions.definition: To render authentic ; to give authority to, by the proof , attestation , or formalities required by law , or sufficient to entitle to credit .
To prove authentic; to determine as real and true .
examples: He didn’t manage to authenticate the portrait: it’s probably a fake.
The server could not authenticate the request.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To render authentic ; to give authority to, by the proof , attestation , or formalities required by law , or sufficient to entitle to credit .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To prove authentic; to determine as real and true .
